Separate values for RX/TX

Start of attributes.
Port Type.
Operational Status.

Current breakout mode.

List of Queues for the port.

List of Scheduler groups for the port.
The sum of the headroom size of the ingress priority groups belonging to this port should not exceed the SAI_PORT_ATTR_QOS_MAXIMUM_HEADROOM_SIZE value.

detaileddescription.para: This attribute is applicable only for per-port, per-PG headroom model (which means SAI_BUFFER_POOL_ATTR_XOFF_SIZE is zero)
For the platforms which don't have this limitation, 0 should be returned.

briefdescription.para: Query list of supported port speed(full-duplex) in Mbps.
Query list of supported port FEC mode.
Query extended list of supported port FEC modes.
Query list of Supported HALF-Duplex speed in Mbps.
Query auto-negotiation support.
Query port supported flow control mode.
Query port supported asymmetric pause mode.
Query port supported MEDIA type.

Query list of Advertised remote port FEC control.
Query extended list of Advertised remote port FEC control.

Query Remote Port's auto-negotiation Advertisement.
Query Remote port Advertised flow control mode.
Query Remote port Advertised asymmetric pause mode.
Query Remote port Advertised MEDIA type.
Query Remote port Advertised OUI Code.
Number of ingress priority groups.
List of ingress priority groups.
List of port's lanes eye values.
Operational speed in Mbps.

detaileddescription.para: If port is down, the returned value should be zero. If auto negotiation is on, the returned value should be the negotiated speed.

briefdescription.para: Hardware Lane list.
Speed in Mbps.

detaileddescription.para: On get, returns the configured port speed.

briefdescription.para: Full Duplex setting.
Auto Negotiation configuration.
Admin Mode.
Media Type.
Query/Configure list of Advertised port speed (Full-Duplex) in Mbps.

detaileddescription.para: Used when auto negotiation is on. Empty list means all supported values are enabled.

briefdescription.para: Query/Configure list of Advertised port FEC Mode.
Query/Configure extended list of Advertised port FEC Mode.
Query/Configure list of Advertised HALF-Duplex speed in Mbps.
Query/Configure Port's Advertised auto-negotiation configuration.
Query/Configure Port's Advertised flow control mode.
Query port's Advertised asymmetric pause mode.
Query/Configure Port's Advertised media type.
Query/Configure Port's Advertised OUI code.

detaileddescription.para: Organizationally Unique Identifier for 25G/50G auto negotiation. Default is 0x6A737D for Ethernet Consortium

briefdescription.para: Port VLAN ID.

detaileddescription.para: Untagged ingress frames are tagged with Port VLAN ID (PVID).

briefdescription.para: Default VLAN Priority.
Dropping of untagged frames on ingress.
Dropping of tagged frames on ingress.
Internal loopback control To be deprecated, use SAI_PORT_ATTR_LOOPBACK_MODE.
Forward Error Correction (FEC) extended control.

detaileddescription.para: Enables use of extended FEC controls as opposed to their non-extended counterparts.

briefdescription.para: Forward Error Correction (FEC) control.
Forward Error Correction (FEC) extended control.
Update DSCP of outgoing packets.
MTU.
Enable flood (unknown unicast or unknown multicast) storm control policer on port.

detaileddescription.para: Set policer id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable policer on port.

briefdescription.para: Enable broadcast storm control policer on port.

detaileddescription.para: Set Policer id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable policer on port.

briefdescription.para: Enable multicast storm control policer on port.

detaileddescription.para: Set policer id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable policer on port.

briefdescription.para: Global flow control.
Port bind point for ingress ACL object.

detaileddescription.para: Bind (or unbind) an ingress ACL table or ACL group on a port. Enable/Update ingress ACL table or ACL group filtering by assigning a valid object id. Disable ingress filtering by assigning SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID in the attribute value.

briefdescription.para: Port bind point for egress ACL object.

detaileddescription.para: Bind (or unbind) an egress ACL tables or ACL group on a port. Enable/Update egress ACL table or ACL group filtering by assigning a valid object id. Disable egress filtering by assigning SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID in the attribute value.

briefdescription.para: Port bind point for ingress MACsec ACL object.

detaileddescription.para: Bind (or unbind) an ingress MACsec ACL table on a port. Enable/Update ingress MACsec ACL table filtering by assigning a valid object id. Disable ingress filtering by assigning SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID in the attribute value.

briefdescription.para: Port bind point for egress MACsec ACL object.

detaileddescription.para: Bind (or unbind) an egress MACsec ACL tables on a port. Enable/Update egress MACsec ACL table filtering by assigning a valid object id. Disable egress filtering by assigning SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID in the attribute value.

briefdescription.para: List of MACsec ports.
Enable/Disable Mirror session.

detaileddescription.para: Enable ingress mirroring by assigning list of mirror session object id as attribute value, disable ingress mirroring by assigning object_count as 0 in objlist.

briefdescription.para: Enable/Disable Mirror session.

detaileddescription.para: Enable egress mirroring by assigning list of mirror session object id as attribute value Disable egress mirroring by assigning object_count as 0 in objlist.

briefdescription.para: Enable/Disable Samplepacket session.

detaileddescription.para: Enable ingress sampling by assigning samplepacket object id Disable ingress sampling by assigning SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID as attribute value.

briefdescription.para: Enable/Disable Samplepacket session.

detaileddescription.para: Enable egress sampling by assigning samplepacket object id Disable egress sampling by assigning SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID as attribute value.

briefdescription.para: Enable/Disable Samplepacket session.

detaileddescription.para: Enable sample ingress mirroring by assigning list of mirror object ids Disable sample ingress mirroring by assigning object_count as 0 in objlist

briefdescription.para: Enable/Disable Samplepacket session.

detaileddescription.para: Enable sample egress mirroring by assigning list of mirror object ids Disable sample egress mirroring by assigning object_count as 0 in objlist

briefdescription.para: Attach/Detach policer to port.

detaileddescription.para: Set policer id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable policer on port.

briefdescription.para: Port default Traffic class Mapping.
Enable DOT1P -> TC MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. To enable/disable trust Dot1p, map ID should be added/removed on port. Default no map.

briefdescription.para: Enable DOT1P -> COLOR MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. To enable/disable trust Dot1p, map ID should be added/removed on port.

briefdescription.para: Enable DSCP -> TC MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. To enable/disable trust DSCP, map ID should be added/removed on port. Default no map.

briefdescription.para: Enable DSCP -> COLOR MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. To enable/disable trust DSCP, map ID should be added/removed on port.

briefdescription.para: Enable TC -> Queue MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map, i.e. all packets to queue 0.

briefdescription.para: Enable TC AND COLOR -> DOT1P MAP.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map.

briefdescription.para: Enable TC AND COLOR -> DSCP MAP.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map.

briefdescription.para: Enable TC -> Priority Group MAP.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map

briefdescription.para: Enable PFC Priority -> Priority Group MAP.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map

briefdescription.para: Enable PFC Priority -> Queue MAP.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map

briefdescription.para: Scheduler for port, Default no limits.

detaileddescription.para: SAI_SCHEDULER_ATTR_MAX_BANDWIDTH_RATE & SAI_SCHEDULER_ATTR_MAX_BANDWIDTH_BURST_RATE attributes alone valid. Rest will be ignored.

briefdescription.para: Ingress buffer profiles for port.

detaileddescription.para: There can be up to SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_INGRESS_BUFFER_POOL_NUM profiles.

briefdescription.para: Egress buffer profiles for port.

detaileddescription.para: There can be up to SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_EGRESS_BUFFER_POOL_NUM profiles.

briefdescription.para: Combined or separate Bit vectors for port PFC RX/TX.
Bit vector enable/disable port PFC.

detaileddescription.para: Valid from bit 0 to bit 7, for combined RX/TX control mode

briefdescription.para: Bit vector enable/disable port PFC RX.

detaileddescription.para: Valid from bit 0 to bit 7, for separate RX/TX control mode

briefdescription.para: Bit vector enable/disable port PFC TX.

detaileddescription.para: Valid from bit 0 to bit 7, for separate RX/TX control mode

briefdescription.para: User based Meta Data.

detaileddescription.para: Value Range SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_PORT_USER_META_DATA_RANGE.

briefdescription.para: Egress block port list.

detaileddescription.para: Needs to be deprecated. Isolation group can be used instead.
Traffic ingressing on this port and egressing out of the ports in the given port list will be dropped.

briefdescription.para: Port Hardware Configuration Profile ID.

detaileddescription.para: Port can require different hardware configuration based on the attached media type, cable length etc. A Profile ID maps to a Port Hardware configuration settings that needs to be applied on the Port. This attribute need not be implemented and can be ignored if the port doesn't require any specific hardware settings based on media type/cable.

briefdescription.para: Port EEE Configuration.

detaileddescription.para: Energy Efficient Ethernet(EEE) is an IEEE 802.3az standard aiming to reduce power consumption on Ethernet ports (native copper ports). Enable the EEE on port level.

briefdescription.para: Port EEE IDLE time configuration.

detaileddescription.para: Time (in microseconds) to move to Low power state (No traffic), at the end of which MAC transitions to Low power state. Max value set more benefit.

briefdescription.para: Port EEE Wakeup time configuration.

detaileddescription.para: Time (in microseconds) to wait before transmitter is leaving Low Power Mode State. Min value set avoid latency.

briefdescription.para: List of port pools for the port.
Isolation group id.

detaileddescription.para: Packets ingressing on the port should not be forwarded to the members present in the isolation group.The isolation group type should be SAI_ISOLATION_GROUP_TYPE_PORT.

briefdescription.para: Port packet transmission enable.

detaileddescription.para: Enable/Disable packet transmission of a port. When packet transmission is disabled on a port, packets are still subject to regular ingress and egress admission control to determine the actions on a packet: whether it is dropped (immediately or after timeout), or whether it is kept in buffers internal to the switch before packet transmission is enabled on the port.

briefdescription.para: Port bind point for TAM object.
Port serdes control pre-emphasis.

detaileddescription.para: Deprecated. Use SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_PORT_SERDES List of port serdes pre-emphasis values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.

briefdescription.para: Port serdes control idriver.

detaileddescription.para: Deprecated. Use SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_PORT_SERDES List of port serdes idriver values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.

briefdescription.para: Port serdes control ipredriver.

detaileddescription.para: Deprecated. Use SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_PORT_SERDES List of port serdes ipredriver values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.

briefdescription.para: Enable/Disable Port Link Training.
Configure PTP mode on the port.
Configure Interface type.
Configure advertised interface type list.

detaileddescription.para: Used when auto negotiation is on. Empty list means all supported values are enabled.

briefdescription.para: Configure port reference clock in hertz.
Port PRBS Polynomial.
Serdes object ID for the port.
Link training failure status and error codes.
Status whether the receiver trained or not trained to receive data.
Attribute data for SAI_PORT_ATTR_PRBS_CONFIG.

detaileddescription.para: PRBS configuration to enable transmitter, receiver or both

briefdescription.para: Attribute data for SAI_PORT_ATTR_PRBS_LOCK_STATUS.

detaileddescription.para: PRBS lock status: 1 for locked, 0 for unlocked

briefdescription.para: Attribute data for SAI_PORT_ATTR_PRBS_LOCK_LOSS_STATUS.

detaileddescription.para: PRBS unlocked status since last read: 1 for lock loss, 0 for no lock loss

briefdescription.para: Attribute data for SAI_PORT_ATTR_PRBS_RX_STATUS.
Attribute data for SAI_PORT_ATTR_PRBS_RX_STATE Used for clear on read status/count register. Adapter should return SAI_STATUS_NOT_SUPPORTED if not supported.
Attribute data for SAI_PORT_ATTR_AUTO_NEG_STATUS.

detaileddescription.para: Auto negotiation (AN) done state: 0 for AN in progress, 1 for AN done If auto negotiation is off, the returned value should be 0.

briefdescription.para: To enable/disable Decrement TTL.
Enable EXP -> TC MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. To enable/disable trust EXP, map ID should be added/removed on port. Default no map. If present overrides SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_QOS_MPLS_EXP_TO_TC_MAP.

briefdescription.para: Enable EXP -> COLOR MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. To enable/disable trust EXP, map ID should be added/removed on port. Default no map. If present overrides SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_QOS_MPLS_EXP_TO_COLOR_MAP.

briefdescription.para: Enable TC AND COLOR -> EXP MAP.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map. If present overrides SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_QOS_TC_AND_COLOR_TO_MPLS_EXP_MAP.

briefdescription.para: TPID.
Port Down Error Status.
Fabric port Attached.

detaileddescription.para: Signifies if the fabric port is attached

briefdescription.para: Attached Switch type.

detaileddescription.para: Signifies the attached switch type

briefdescription.para: Attached Switch ID.

detaileddescription.para: Signifies the attached switch ID

briefdescription.para: Attached Port Index.

detaileddescription.para: Signifies the attached port index

briefdescription.para: Fabric port reachability.
System port for the port.
FEC mode auto-negotiation override status.

detaileddescription.para: If set to true, any auto-negotiated FEC mode will be overridden by the value configured in SAI_PORT_ATTR_FEC_MODE

briefdescription.para: Internal or External loopback control.
MDIX mode status for the port.
MDIX mode configuration for the port.
Configure auto negotiation configuration mode for the port.
Enable auto detection between 1000X and SGMII slave mode.
Configure Fiber module type.
Configure media types for dual media supported PHY.
Query the Auto Negotiated Resolved FEC.

detaileddescription.para: Auto negotiated FEC status is applicable on Auto Negotiation good state

briefdescription.para: Configures inter frame gap for an ethernet port.

detaileddescription.para: IPG is mandated by IEEE 802.3 to ensure reliable communication between two Ethernet devices. The minimum recommended inter-packet gap(IPG) by IEEE 802.3 is 96 bits (12 bytes)

briefdescription.para: Forward or terminate the global flow control(802.3X) frame.

detaileddescription.para: If true, flow control frames are switched between ports. If false, flow control frames are terminated by the switch.

briefdescription.para: Forward or terminate the PFC(802.1Qbb) frame.

detaileddescription.para: If true, flow control frames are switched between ports. If false, flow control frames are terminated by the switch.

briefdescription.para: Enable DSCP -> Forwarding Class MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map.

briefdescription.para: Enable EXP -> Forwarding Class MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map.

briefdescription.para: Associated IPsec port.
PFC Deadlock Detection timer interval range.
PFC Deadlock Detection timer interval in milliseconds.

detaileddescription.para: If the monitored queue is in XOFF state for more than this duration then its considered to be in a PFC deadlock state and recovery process is kicked off. Note: Use TC (Traffic Class) value as key and timer interval as value.

briefdescription.para: PFC Deadlock Recovery timer interval range.
PFC Deadlock Recovery timer interval in milliseconds.

detaileddescription.para: The PFC deadlock recovery process will run for this amount of time and then normal state will resume. If the system remains in a deadlock state then the detection and recovery will resume again after the configured detection timer interval. Note: Use TC (Traffic Class) value as key and timer interval as value.

briefdescription.para: Query link-training support.
List of port's PMD lanes rx signal detect.
List of port's PMD lanes rx lock status.
Port's PCS RX Link Status.
List of port's FEC lanes alignment marker lock.
Fabric port isolation setting.

detaileddescription.para: true: The link may be enabled in serdes level and the MAC level, but the link partner will not use it for traffic distribution. false: Undo the isolation operation. This attribute is for fabric links only.

briefdescription.para: Query the maximum number of symbols with errors that can be detected by the current FEC code (per FEC codeword).
Enable ARS on port. This enables the control for quality measure in switch pipeline.
Scaling factor to account for different port speeds. Port speed is normalized using the scaling factor specified 10G:1, 25G:2.5, 40G:4, 50G:5, 100G:10, 200G:20, 400G:40.
Enable historical or past port load quality measure in switch pipeline. This attribute is deprecated and SAI_PORT_ATTR_ARS_PORT_LOAD_PAST_WEIGHT value will indicate if this metric is enabled or not.
Enable future load quality measure in switch pipeline This attribute is deprecated and SAI_PORT_ATTR_ARS_PORT_LOAD_FUTURE_WEIGHT value will indicate if this metric is enabled or not.
Port is part of primary or alternate path set false: Port is part of primary path set true: Port is part of alternate path set.
Gather port debug information.

detaileddescription.para: Standard attribute to retrieve vendor-specific debug information about the port's current status. The returned data should be in the form of a JSON-encoded string.
Example possible response: { "port_index": "123", "lane_1": { "serdes_fw_rev": "B345", "dc_offset": "1" }, "additional_debug_data": "Some\n additional\n information" }

briefdescription.para: SAI ECMP hash algorithm which can override algorithm set by SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_ECMP_DEFAULT_HASH_ALGORITHM for this port.
SAI ECMP hash seed which can override seed set by SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_ECMP_DEFAULT_HASH_SEED for this port.
SAI ECMP hash offset which can override offset set by SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_ECMP_DEFAULT_HASH_OFFSET for this port.
Operational FEC mode.

detaileddescription.para: If port is down or auto negotiation is in progress, the returned value should be SAI_PORT_FEC_MODE_NONE. If auto negotiation is on, the returned value should be the negotiated FEC. If auto negotiation is off, the returned value should be the set value.

briefdescription.para: Enable host_tx_signal (high-speed signal from ASIC to module) required to start the CMIS module initialization.
Host tx ready status.

detaileddescription.para: It will be used for query and capability query of "host_tx_ready" signal

briefdescription.para: Configure path tracing interface id.
Configure path tracing timestamp template.
List of per lane RX Frequency PPM for a port.
List of per lane RX SNR for a port.
Port's DATA PATH Enable.

detaileddescription.para: true: If NO FEC is selected and the data path is enabled as PCS, the packet is checked for lane alignment marker and it aligns recovered data in receive direction. PCS RX link status is set if the packet is properly aligned. SAI_PORT_DATAPATH_ENABLE_PASS_THROUGH_MODE: Default pass-through data path is used where packet is passed without any processing. This attribute is valid only if SAI_PORT_ATTR_FEC_MODE_EXTENDED is selected as SAI_PORT_FEC_MODE_EXTENDED_NONE.

briefdescription.para: Read ethernet copper cable pair status.

detaileddescription.para: Returns pair states sequentially from list index 0 to n (n = number of pairs - 1) value of n depends on number of pairs in twisted ethernet copper cable Cable diagnostics triggers ECD once cable pair states is requested, it is synchronous call.

briefdescription.para: Get ethernet copper cable pair length (unit meter)

detaileddescription.para: Returns ethernet cable pair length sequentially from list index 0 to n (n = number of pairs - 1) value of n depends on number of pairs in twisted ethernet copper cable Cable diagnostics runs once cable pair length is requested, it is synchronous call.

briefdescription.para: Configure ethernet copper cable type to check the cable status.
Assign weight in percent to past port load quality measure in switch pipeline. All quality measures if add up to less then 100 then remaining value is used for vendor specific internal weights.
Assign weight in percent to future load quality measure in switch pipeline. All quality measures if add up to less then 100 then remaining value is used for vendor specific internal weights.
On NPUs that support POE, read the associated POE port ID.
The maximum size of SAI_PORT_ATTR_JSON_FORMATTED_DEBUG_DATA in bytes.
End of attributes.

detaileddescription.para: Custom range base value
End of custom range base
Extensions range base

briefdescription.para: Attribute Id in sai_set_port_attribute() and sai_get_port_attribute() calls.

detaileddescription.para: Port stat range start
SAI port stat if in octets
SAI port stat if in ucast pkts
SAI port stat if in non ucast pkts
SAI port stat if in discards
SAI port stat if in errors
SAI port stat if in unknown protocols
SAI port stat if in broadcast pkts
SAI port stat if in multicast pkts
SAI port stat if in vlan discards
SAI port stat if out octets
SAI port stat if out ucast pkts
SAI port stat if out non ucast pkts
SAI port stat if out discards
SAI port stat if out errors
SAI port stat if out queue length
SAI port stat if out broadcast pkts
SAI port stat if out multicast pkts
SAI port stat ether stats drop events

briefdescription.para: PFC pause duration for RX and TX per PFC priority [uint64_t].

detaileddescription.para: RX pause duration for certain priority is a the duration quanta in ingress pause frame for that priority (a pause frame received by the switch). While TX pause duration for certain priority is the duration quanta in egress pause frame for that priority (a pause frame sent by the switch).

SAI port stat PFC 1 rx duration

briefdescription.para: PFC pause duration for RX and TX per PFC priority in micro seconds [uint64_t].

detaileddescription.para: RX pause duration for certain priority is a the duration in micro seconds converted from quanta in ingress pause frame for that priority (a pause frame received by the switch). While TX pause duration for certain priority is the duration in micro seconds converted from quanta in egress pause frame for that priority (a pause frame sent by the switch).

Frames received that are an integral number of octets in length but do not pass the FCS check

Frames that are involved in a more than one collision collision, and are subsequently transmitted successfully

detaileddescription.para: This Duration is accumulative since EEE enable on port/from last clear stats.

detaileddescription.para: This Duration is accumulative since EEE enable on port/from last clear stats.

SAI port stat if in FEC correctable pkts
SAI port stat if in FEC not correctable pkts
SAI port stat if in FEC symbol errors
Fabric port stat in data units
Fabric port stat out data units

briefdescription.para: Port FEC codeword symbol error counters.

detaileddescription.para: This set of counters corresponds to number of symbol errors in each FEC codeword received on the port.

The number of symbol errors that may be detected is dependent on the type of FEC in use. For instance, RS-528 FEC supports detection of up to 7 symbol errors, while RS-544 FEC supports detection of up to 15 symbol errors. The maximum number of errors that can be detected by the port's current FEC mode may be retrieved via the SAI_PORT_ATTR_MAX_FEC_SYMBOL_ERRORS_DETECTABLE port attribute. If the codeword contains more than SAI_PORT_ATTR_MAX_FEC_SYMBOL_ERRORS_DETECTABLE, the errors are placed in the next higher counter (so for the examples above, SAI_PORT_STAT_IF_IN_FEC_CODEWORD_ERRORS_S8 would be used for greater than 7 symbol errors when RS-528 FEC is used, and SAI_PORT_STAT_IF_IN_FEC_CODEWORD_ERRORS_S16 for greater than 15 symbol errors when using RS-544). Count of FEC codewords with no symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 1 symbol error.
Count of FEC codewords with 2 symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 3 symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 4 symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 5 symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 6 symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 7 symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 8 symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 9 symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 10 symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 11 symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 12 symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 13 symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 14 symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 15 symbol errors.
Count of FEC codewords with 16 symbol errors.
Count of total bits corrected by FEC. Counter will increment monotonically.

Port serdes control pre-emphasis.
